script.title: ex-anton.slax
script.author: phil
script.synopsis: Turn a list of addresses into a list of MPLS LSPs
script.description: We want a list of addresses to be turned into a list of MPLS LSPs
script.implementation: An apply-macro under [protocols mpls] is configured with a set of addresses and a 'color' parameter. Each address is turned into an LSP configuration, with the color as an admin-group.
